## Project Information

- **Project Type**: Next.js Domain Sale Landing Page
- **Domain**: charitr.com
- **Purpose**: Professional landing page for selling a premium domain
- **Technologies**: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

## Development Guidelines

- Use clean, minimal, and professional design
- Implement responsive design for all screen sizes
- Include subtle animations for better user experience
- Follow modern web development best practices
- Ensure proper SEO optimization

## Features Required

- Hero section with domain name prominently displayed
- Contact information with WhatsApp and email links
- Inquiry form for potential buyers
- Domain value information ($1700 USD on GoDaddy)
- Call-to-action buttons
- Mobile-friendly responsive design
